name: imf

stmt.origin: fmpti(hs0, cim, cc, cr, cfv(cre, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, ci)))

body.origin:
|- wf(cim, cc, cr)
-| wceq(cim, cmpt(hs0, cc, cfv(cre, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, ci))))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cfv(cre, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, ci)), cr))
-| diffsc(hs0, cc)
-| diffsc(hs0, cr)

cumulated.origin:
|- wf(cim, cc, cr)
-| wceq(cim, cmpt(hs0, cc, cfv(cre, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, ci))))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cfv(cre, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, ci)), cr))
-| diffsc(hs0, cc)
-| diffsc(hs0, cr)

body.origin: |- wceq(cim, cmpt(hs0, cc, cfv(cre, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, ci))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wf(cim, cc, cr)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cfv(cre, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, ci)), cr))
-| diffsc(hs0, cc)
-| diffsc(hs0, cr)

⊢ (Im : ℂ → ℝ)
⊣ (hs0 ∈ ℂ →(Re `(hs0[÷]i))∈ ℝ)
⊣ d(hs0, ℂ)
⊣ d(hs0, ℝ)

comment: Domain and codomain of the imaginary part function. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 22-Oct-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Nov-2013.)
